Work experience

OzSoft Solutions Pty Ltd

Database Software Support

January 2007 - September 2013

Description

While working at OzSoft in the Database Software Support role, I handled a wide range of tasks focused around customer service. This included producing 'custom reports' for our clients that we developed using a combination of Firebird SQL, MS SQL Server and PascalScript.

This role involved a lot of interaction with customers on topics that were often quite technical. From this role I have gained experience in talking to non-technical people about technical matters and am able to do so in a friendly, relateable way.

Responsibilities

  • Phone/email support
  • Database support
  • Web/mobile development
